parameters.query: SELECT email FROM digest_recipients WHERE enabled = TRUE
SELECT id, url, title, content, source, published_at, summary_short, summary_long, fetched_at FROM articles WHERE processed = TRUE AND sent = FALSE ORDER BY fetched_at DESC
UPDATE articles SET sent = TRUE WHERE id::text = ANY(string_to_array($1, ','))

parameters.content:
## No Recipients

No enabled recipients found.
Add recipients via API:
POST /api/recipients

## No New Articles

No unsent articles to include in digest.

## Recipients from Database

Recipients are managed via API:
- POST /api/recipients (add)
- GET /api/recipients (list)
- DELETE /api/recipients/{id}
- PATCH /api/recipients/{id}/toggle
